text: magar jin logon ne apane paravaradigaar kee parahezagaaree (ikhteyaar kee unake lie behisht ke) vah baagaat hain jinake neeche naharen jaareen hain aur vah hamesha usee mein rahenge ye khuda kee taraf se unakee (daavat hai aur jo saazo saamaan) khuda ke yaho hai vah neko kaaron ke vaaste duniya se kaheen behatar hai
